Sentence: Recently, the disruption of interactions between E2 ubiquitin conjugating enzymes ( Ubc13 and Ubc5hc) and E3 ubiquitin ligases ( TRAF6, TRAF2 and cIAP1 / 2) were described as another important mechanism used by A20 to downregulate NF - kappaB signalling [ 42].
